channel.title: Exams on MIT OpenCourseWare
channel.description: Recent content in Exams on MIT OpenCourseWare

item.title: Exams
item.description: The exams are worth 80% of the final grade. Solutions for Exam #4 are not available. EXAMS SOLUTIONS Exam 1 (PDF) (PDF) Exam 2 (PDF) (PDF) Exam 3 (PDF) (PDF) Exam 4 (PDF)

item.title: MIT15_075JF11_exam01_soln.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on the solution of exam 1 based on probability, and conditional probability.

item.title: MIT15_075JF11_exam01.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on the exam 1 based on probability, and conditional probability.

item.title: MIT15_075JF11_exam02_soln.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on the solution of exam 2 based on total success rates, and probability.

item.title: MIT15_075JF11_exam02.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on the exam 2 based on total success rates, and probability.

item.title: MIT15_075JF11_exam03_soln.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on the solution of exam 3 based on hypotheses H0 : p1 = p2, and true proportion.

item.title: MIT15_075JF11_exam03.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on the exam 3 based on hypotheses H0 : p1 = p2, and true proportion.

item.title: MIT15_075JF11_exam04.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on the solution of exam 4 based on t-test, hypothesis, multiple regression, and variance.
